actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: To remove the exemption from property taxes of property of an international organization used for commercial activities in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the International Organizations Immunities Act to make an exemption from property taxes inapplicable to property of an international organization used for commercial activities in the United States.

titles.title: To remove the exemption from property taxes of property of an international organization used for commercial activities in the United States.
